PERSONA:
meet 72-year-old harold thompson, a married, white non-hispanic man living in a non-metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. a lifelong resident of the u.s., harold was born and raised in a small town in texas and has lived there his entire life. he is a proud conservative republican with strong christian values, identifying as a born-again protestant who regularly attends church services more than once a week.

harold's education background includes a college degree, with some postgraduate work, which he completed at a local university. he met his wife, margaret, in college, and they have been married for 45 years. margaret is a retired school teacher, and harold worked as an accountant for a local firm until his retirement five years ago.

their household income is around $55,000, placing them firmly in the middle-income bracket. although they have a comfortable life, harold is frugal and careful with his finances, valuing hard work and self-reliance. he is also a firm believer in the importance of civic duty, as evident from his enthusiastic affirmation of being an absolutely certain registered voter at his current address.

despite his busy schedule with church activities, harold makes time to stay updated on current events, using the internet several times a week to read news and stay informed about national and local issues. his conservative ideology is reflected in his views on politics, social issues, and his support for the republican party.

as a proud member of his community, harold is well-respected for his strong moral compass and dedication to his faith. although he may not be as actively involved in volunteer work, his contributions to his church and his unwavering commitment to his family and community are testaments to his good character.
